description:
This table stores the findings documented by technologists using old drawing tools. �


This table only exists to support historical data and no new data should be populated into it.�

columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the order record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: TECH_FINDING_ID
columns.description: Stores the findings documented by technologists using old drawing tools. This column exists only to support historical data and no new data should be populated into it.
